entities.name: cruciatus curse
entities.description: The Cruciatus Curse is a type of curse that causes intense pain. It is mentioned in the text as being used by Voldemort on Harry.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort is the main antagonist of the story, who uses the Cruciatus Curse on Harry. He is described as having slit-like nostrils and red eyes.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the protagonist of the story, who is subjected to the Cruciatus Curse by Voldemort. He is described as screaming loudly and shaking uncontrollably.

entities.name: wormtail
entities.description: Wormtail is a character mentioned in the text, who had his hand cut off. Harry compares himself to Wormtail after being subjected to the Cruciatus Curse.

entities.name: cedric
entities.description: Cedric is a character mentioned in the text, who died at the hands of Voldemort. Harry fears that he will die like Cedric after being subjected to the Cruciatus Curse.

relationships.description: Voldemort uses the Cruciatus Curse on Harry, causing him intense pain. This is described in the text as 'a little break' and 'a little pause'.
Harry compares himself to Wormtail after being subjected to the Cruciatus Curse, describing himself as shaking uncontrollably like Wormtail did when his hand was cut off.
Voldemort killed Cedric, and Harry fears that he will die like Cedric after being subjected to the Cruciatus Curse.
